As she runs through the door, bits of clothing fall in her wake as she tries to ignore the sound of rips as her senses of sound and smell become more intense. The open stares of those waiting in line don't bother her as she runs out the front door.

As Margret is running down the street, another thought hit her - she didn't have a collar or dog license. If she was caught, she'd end up in the pound! Then she realized she was actually thinking about wearing a dog collar. Her entire future was changing before her eyes.

11111121.content:
The waiter brought over a couple glasses of water. By this time, Margret was starting to feel exceptionally warm. She brought the glass up to her mouth, and put the glass to her lips. She tilted the glass up to take a drink. As the water hit her mouth, she tried to swallow. Instead a long, flat tongue jutted out of her mouth and nearly to the bottom of the glass lapping up the water.

"Honey, are you OK?" asked Jack.

"Oh yes, I feel much better now." replied Margret. Jack just shook his head, figuring that he must be seeing things.

The waiter then placed a plate of hot, steaming Sirloin in front of Margret.

Margret's head perked up and took a couple sniffs of the rich aroma rising from the beef in front of her. Margret quickly cut the beef into bit sized pieces. Then her head went down, and her tongue came out of her mouth, scooped up a little beef chunk, and rolled it down her throat.

Jack watched as his wife inhaled the steak. It was like someone had made eating with a knife and fork alien to Margret, and made lapping up food natural for her.

Finally, the meal was finished. At the time, it was perfectly natural to eat that way, and the realization actually didn't hit Margret until she lapped up some more water to wash down the steak. She paused with her tongue in the water. She was drinking and eating like an animal!

"Honey, what's happening to me?" Margret asked.

1111112111.content:
When they arrived home Jack opened the passenger door and Margret jumped out of the car. As he stared down at Margret, something seemed different somehow. He couldn’t quite put his finger on it, but she looked different somehow. There was something odd about the way she was standing. While her hands and feet were on the ground, her butt wasn’t high in the air like he thought it should be. It was sticking up, but not like he thought it would. Jack slowly circled his love to get a better look at her.

Margret noticed him staring at her as he walked around her. This distracted her enough and caused her to sit down on the ground. “What’s up with him?” she thought to herself. She tilted her head to the side in puzzlement. This caused Jack to stop and stare. Margret couldn’t figure out what he was staring at.

She then looked down at herself and froze. Even though her ass was on the ground both of her feet were flat on the ground with her hands in between them. Margret knew that this position should be difficult to get into or at least uncomfortable, but it didn’t. It actually felt natural.

“Honey, are you okay?” Jack asked with a quiver in his voice.

Margret wanted to say, “I feel fine, but what’s going on?” To her surprise, the only sounds she made was a canine whimpering.

Jack continued to stare as he realized that Margret’s thighs were thickening, growing more muscular. At the same time, her calves were shrinking and her feet were extending. He couldn’t say a word. All he could do was point a shaking finger at Margret’s legs.

Margret looked down slowly to where Jack was pointing. She couldn’t believe her eyes. She could see her legs changing, but she couldn’t feel a thing. No tingling, burning, aching, no nothing. She watched as her toes swelled, causing her toenails to fall to the ground. What really made her stare was the sight of her big toe shriveling to a tiny nub as it slowly moved past what once was her ankles. Once the swelling stopped, tiny black claws began to emerge from the tip of each toe. Cautiously, she raised her left foot into the air. Both could plainly see that her foot was now a hairless dog’s paw. Testing her new appendage, she raised it as high as it would go. Margret surprised herself as she slowly scratched behind her ear. In shock, she quickly slammed her paw to the ground.

Jack was now as pail as sheet. “This has to be a dream,” he mumbled. “This can’t be happening.”

Margret tried to stand up, but her legs wouldn’t move like she wanted them too. All she could do was rise to a standing position on her hands and rear paws.

1111212212.content:
After chewing the bone for a while, Margret wanted to save it for later. Instead of putting it in the fridge, she stuck the bone in her mouth and walked out the back door. She looked around for a good spot to hide the bone.

She saw a dirt patch near the big oak tree and thought it would be perfect. Margret sat down and started digging with her hands. Normally the soil was very hard and it would be difficult to dig, but Margret was doing it with ease. As Margret looked down she soon realized why.

Her nails had fallen out, and laid scattered in front of her. The tips of her fingers flared up in agony as tiny points slowly made tents out of her skin before finally tearing through the top. The holes made were small and tight enough that almost no blood came out, but the pain was unbearable. It felt as if her very bones were pushing themselves out.

A swelling built up in the skin surrounding each claw, but slowly spread to the entire digit. The top joints of her fingers swelled grotesquely while the rest simply shrank into her knuckles. Her thumbs almost completely disappeared; all that remained was a tiny little clawed nub. The palms of her hands swelled as well, drying and cracking as they gained mass. They felt like leather pads.

Margret now longer had hands, but a set of paws. Paws: The very word makes Margret whimper in sorrow now as she knows they’ve replaced her useful hands and possibly they have been replaced for good.

"What is it honey?" Margret asked.

"My legs," Lauren said. "It feels like they are twisting, and they are really warm under the blanket."

Margret pulled the cover off of Lauren's legs, she couldn't have been prepared for what she saw next.

The first thing Margret noticed was that Lauren's feet had changed to the point that they were more paws than human feet.

122.content:
Jack notices an unusual number of white hairs on the backs of his hands. Aw heck, he thinks, I'm getting more grays. Damn middle-age. He knelt behind the counter to set up his jars of biscotti. Almond, chocolate, macadamia nut, and his own specialty, cinnamon raisin, all go up on the counter just beside the "Flavor of the Month" bulletin. He puts his hand on the counter to raise himself off the ground, but as he moves his weight to it, his fingers lose their grip. Jack manages to catch the edge of the counter with his fingernails. As he lifts himself to the level of the countertop, he notices that his nails had left deep grooves in the dark wood. He curses himself for not trimming his nails, and goes to look for the wood stain in the closet, hoping no one will notice the marred counter if the color is the same.

The lightbulb in the closet has been blown out for a week now. Jack tries to search for the stain by touch, but he can't seem to get a good hold on anything. Frustrated now, he grabs the flashlight by the closet door and tries to turn it on, but somehow, he cannot reach the switch. His thumb slips right off the button everytime he pushes down, and using two hands is no better. He holds the flashlight between his thighs and hits the button as hard as he can. The light comes on, and he realizes to his horror that the reason his thumb could not reach the switch is because he no longer has a thumb. Jack is staring at two big, white, furry paws.

Jack lets the light drop from between his legs, which, frightningly, feel furry beneath his trousers. He sputters for a moment, unsure of what to do next.

1322.content:
This whole thought about becoming a whole other species made him shake. "What? I'm- I'm going to become a dog? Our whole family is? What? I can't let anyone see me become one!" Looking around, he followed his dad back into the house. Once inside he found a Poodle, who he knew was his mom, and what looked like his dad, partially naked on all fours and a ton of fur everywhere. "Dad?" His dad, now engulfed in fur and a tail growing, whimpered and ran upstairs, with his mom following closely behind. The truth was becoming overwhelming for him and Zach fell back almost fainting. A few minutes after his parents went upstairs, he heard a creak from his sister's room. "Oh no! Is Lauren a dog too?" he asked quietly. His question was answered as his sister, still human, came from her room yawning. "Huh? Zach? What are you doing home? You're supposed to be at sch-" She stopped as she noticed how pail his face was. "W-what's wrong?" Zach gulped and tried to become calm. "I was going to school when dad came to me looking a little weird... He was running really fast! I mean it was almost unnatural, but then his tongue would flop a bit! A-and then he told me mom became a dog!" Lauren laughed a little. "Zach? are you alright? People just can't become animals. It's impossible!" Zach knocked Lauren's hand away from his head as she tried putting it there to check his temperature. "I'm serious! Dad told me that sometime before today, Mom cursed our family to become a dog once a day! Mom's already a poodle, and if we look for dad, he'd probably be a full dog now! Though from what I saw, I can't tell what breed he is, but it's not a poodle, so I guess that means we all have different breeds..."
Lauren, after hearing Zach insisting of this dream or thought, became upset. "Alright Zach, if you're just gonna lie so you can skip school, then I'm telling mom!" Zach groaned and left. "Fine! Don't believe me! Just prepare! It could happen to us at any second!" Lauren marched upstairs in case the part of their parents being home was the only truth in his story. She thought that even if it wasn't, there would still be a phone to call them with. Once she entered the bedroom, she called out for her mom and dad. "Mom? Dad? Are you really here?! Mom? Daaadd?! Figures..." Lauren was about to leave when she heard a whine. "Did I hear a whine?" Looking around more thoroughly, she tried to find the source of the noise until she looked under the bed. A fluffy St. Bernard whined, but came from under the bed. He looked embarrassed, but Lauren was too distracted that there was a dog in the house to realize it. "A dog? Was Zach... No! It's still impossible!" Lauren tried to forget Zach's story and instead tried to play with the dog, deciding not to call her parents. Her and Zach's dad, though mortified that his daughter was seeing him now, felt instinctively happy and began wagging his tail. "Baroff!" Lauren was so happy that the dog was there, even though it was weird how it could've gotten in. "You're a good dog aren't you?" The St. Bernard licked her cheek as his tail wagged more. He knew it was still his daughter, but the canine urges pulled him to lick her like a pet would to it's master or other people. Soon, a poodle came out from hiding, shocking Lauren. "A poodle?..." Why did the sound of a poodle seem familiar? Then it hit her. M-mom?" The poodle nodded, making Lauren jump. "Oh my gosh! Zach was right!"

134.content:
His best friend, Jake, was waving as he walked up to Zack. Jake was Zack's best and only friend, because of their shared hatred of dogs. "Hey Jake!" Zack greeted him.

"Hey Zack, mind if I walk with you to school? This weird dog has been following me." Jake nervously glanced behind him.

Zack followed his friend's gaze, and he saw the strange dog. It didn't look menacing, just creepy. "Yeah, that dog looks like trouble." He then yelled at it. "GO AWAY YOU STUPID MUTT!"

"YEAH! SHEW!" Jake yelled. The dog just sat there, and tilted its head to the side.

"Whatever, come on." Zack said as he and Jake started walking toward school again. As soon as they turned their backs, the dog followed, keeping the same distance between them.

Feeling nervous, Jake turned. Instantly, the dog sat down again. "Uh...Zack, the dog is still following."

Zack turned around. "That stupid dog, can't it take a hint." Suddenly, the dog rushed them. Both boys screamed as they bolted toward an alleyway. The dog pursued them.

They kept running until they reached a dead end. The boys quickly turned back for the way they came, but the dog blocked the only exit. They began waving frantically and yelling, "Get back you mutt." The dog just sat their staring at them, so they started throwing anything they could at him.

The dog finally barked, silencing them. Before their eyes, the dog transformed into an old man. "Hmm...I tried giving you a chance Zack. I figured that you were young enough not to be under the same twisted hatred your family has toward my fellow canines. I was wrong. And you, Jake. My curse was only going to extend to the Tampert family, but I have decided to add you in it."

"What!?" they both yelled. Zack continued, "We never did anything to you? Besides if you are a dog, then that makes you just a stupid mutt."

Jake continued, "Yeah, now beat it." Jake threw a broken tree branch at the old man. The man was barely able to avoid it.

He yelled with rage, "I have had it with you two! You two are the worst brats that I have ever..." The man then grew a devious smile. "I know the perfect way to punish you two. You two can share the curse."

"What does that mean!" Jake glared at him.

With one wave of his hand, Jake and Zack crashed into each other. They clothes began to dissolve away, being replaced with golden brown fur. Their muscles and bones began to rearrange, forcing them onto all fours. Their hands and feat quickly turned into paws. Their noses grew out, causing the mouth st stretch forward too. Their eyes turned dark brown. The ears also grew, and bent downward. Jake's right arm and leg, and Zack's left arm and leg began to merge together. Their furry bodies then began to join. One tail shot out of their joined bodies. The transformation was finally complete. Jake and Zack had been turned into a two-headed golden retriever.

14111111.content:
Lauren shakes her head and comes around.

"Lauren are you alright. You've been acting really strange." says Katie.

"You've got to help me Katie, I'm changing into an animal." says Lauren.

"Stop joking around Lauren" Katie says.

Lauren grabs Katie by the hand and says "I'm not kidding, Katie. I..." Lauren is cut off as her hands began to cramp up, and the tip of her fingers began to burn like fire. She held one up, looking at it. She was absolutely stunned to see that her nails were thickening and darkening into... claws! She couldn't believe her eyes!

Then Lauren saw the palm of her hand start to swell up and darken, and her hand itself began to lengthen! It hurt like a bad cramp. Looking at her hands, she couldn't avoid admitting that they were looking less and less like hands and more and more like... paws!

Before Lauren could think what to do about her condition, she was hit by a gut-wrenching pain and doubled over, grabbing her stomach. Something was going on deep inside her, and the sensation was indescribable. It was as if her intestines were actually rearranging and twisting inside her.

As she clenched at her shirt, her newly forming claws tore holes in her shirt, but she was too overcome by the sensations inside her to notice. When she finally realized what she had done to her shirt, she gasped in shock. What was happening to her? Could she really be changing into a... dog?!

Then she was hit by a horrific pain in her shoulder blades, and heard her shirt rip in the back. What she had no way of seeing or knowing was that her shoulder muscles were swelling up and reforming, preparing the way for her shoulder joints to follow.

The pain in her back grew too much to take, so she began to roll over onto her hands and knees, a position that brought her great relief. She panicked, realizing the the reason for this relief - this position suddenly felt too right and natural. She let out a horrified moan, "Noooo!!!!"

Lauren realized she had to stand up and get help. As she got to two feet, she felt incredibly unsteady. And she was hit by a sharp pain in her feet. She looked down at her feet, and gasped. They too were changing! They had dark claws sprouting from their toes, and they were thinning out as well. Worse yet, she found it too painful to put any weight on her heels and instead had to stand on the balls of her feet.

She was able to balance on the balls of her feet, but as soon as she took the weight off her heels, her feet began to change even more. Soon she was in a struggle to remain standing, her feet and legs forcing her more and more to lose her balance and fall onto all fours. But finally her feet changed too much and she lost her balance, falling forward, going down... and hitting the ground on all fours, landing on her new front paws.

She realized that she was now quite naturally standing on four feet. This terrified her, and she panicked - she realized that it really was happening to her - he was turning into an animal - she was becoming a dog!

She struggled to get up off fours, to stand on two feet like a human again, but she couldn't do it. Her shoulders popped and cracked, as did her hips, leaving her in sheer agony, her joints locking into for-legged position, trapping her on all fours.

She looked up and saw her reflection and let out a shriek that sounded scarily like a howl. Her ears were now pointed and had moved atop her head, and her face had changed - her nose was blackening, she could feel a pressure on her nose and mouth.

Her shoulders began to itch, and she looked in the mirror, horrified to see the hair on her head growing down, invading the smooth skin of her neck and shoulders. The hair grew down further and further on her back, thickening and changing in texture, becoming more and more coarse, less like human hair, and more like... fur!

As the fur continued to thicken on her back, her nose and jaw began to ache even more. She clenched her face muscles, refusing to let them betray her and reform any further, but despite her effort, her nose and jaw began to thrust slowly outward.

She turned once more to the mirror, and her heart almost stopped. As she raised a hand, which was now nothing more than a dog's paw, she looked at her face and her first thought was not "me", but rather, "dog"! Fur was already creeping onto her forehead and cheeks, her nose was now fully black, and her nose and mouth already formed a small but definite inhuman muzzle.

info.brief_description: What Happens when a family is cursed to become dogs?
info.description:
The Tampert family always had a dislike for dogs. One night, Margret Tampert, the mom of the family, is walking to her car after a long day of work when a stray German Shepard comes up to her and begs for help. Margret shoos the dog away, not giving it any love. As she walks away, the German Shepard transforms into a older man.

"Your Family is now cursed, for you show no love for animals. From now on, Once everyday each member of your family will transform in dogs at a random time in the day, until you learn how to break the curse..."

Margret, scared, watches the old man dissappear. She shrugs it off, thinking that it was caused from her tiredness. The next day comes It is friday and the whole family wakes up for the day that will change their lives forever...


No Sexual Content Please

NOTES:
For future reference, Margret's Mom will transform into a Cocker Spaniel and Margret's Dad will transform into a bulldog.
Any other contiunity updates will appear in this area.
